title: The Question tree
brief_description: Dramatised incidents are used in discussing some of the basic elements of research, and to show typical activities such as cryonics, brain research, research into the living cell, language translation, and light amplification (laser). Points out that the key to progress in research is in determining which question to ask and which problems are ready to be solved.
